title: How Democracy Itself Ended Up on the Ballot in Wisconsin
description: A 50-50 battleground state has become an experiment in single-party rule — and today’s election may push it a stage further.
dc:creator: Michael Barbaro, Rob Szypko, Rachel Quester, Mooj Zadie, Mike Benoist, Marion Lozano, Rowan Niemisto, Dan Powell, Elisheba Ittoop and Chris Wood

media:content.media:credit: Tim Gruber for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A voting sign in Wisconsin. Republican officials hope to entrench power in elections on Tuesday.
